title: Precious Pelt Alpha Circuit
objectives: Stage cold-weather capture gear and merchant logistics before heading north
Farm the Sealed Realm of the Pristine for guaranteed Sibelyx alpha drops
Chain No. 3 Wildlife Sanctuary and nearby overworld alphas for supplemental pelts
Liquidate pelts to bankroll late-game schematics and alloy queues

failure_penalties.normal: Dying on the island triggers PIDF trespass escalations and wastes the hour-long sealed realm timer before pelts respawn.
failure_penalties.hardcore: Hardcore wipes on sanctuary raids risk losing irreplaceable legendary pals and the gathered pelts if the team cannot extract.

adaptive_guidance.underleveled: Run the sealed realm with ranged pals and cold meals until you can comfortably tackle Sanctuary level 50 patrols—bank the 6–8 pelts per Sibelyx clear first.【palwiki-sealed-realms†L44-L76】【palwiki-sibelyx†L87-L106】
adaptive_guidance.overleveled: Add Astegon and Blazamut overworld rotations between realm resets so every respawn cycle drops pelts and extra alloy mats for the forge queue.【palwiki-alpha-pals†L295-L307】

resource_shortages.solution: Clear the Sealed Realm of the Pristine on the hour; its alpha table guarantees 6–8 pelts before you sweep the sanctuary circuit again.【palwiki-sealed-realms†L44-L76】【palwiki-sibelyx†L87-L106】

adaptive_guidance.time_limited: If you only have ten minutes, run the sealed realm first—the dungeon respawns hourly while sanctuary alphas can wait until the next patrol cycle.【palwiki-sealed-realms†L44-L76】【palwiki-alpha-pals†L12-L18】

dynamic_rules.adjustment: Assign one hunter to break shields while the partner focuses on captures and PIDF suppression so you can chain hunts without downtime.
Keep one flyer airborne to extract pelts if someone falls—Hardcore failures are permanent and the sealed realm timer keeps ticking.

failure_recovery.normal: Sleep until dawn to reset overworld alpha timers, then re-run the sealed realm once the entrance timer expires.
failure_recovery.hardcore: Have a backup flyer ferry pelts to base between fights so Hardcore wipes do not forfeit the haul.

steps.summary: Stage cold gear and sale logistics
steps.detail: Restock Mega or Hyper Spheres, swap into cold-resistant armor, and park a Pal Merchant near base so you can immediately cash in pelts for 500 Gold each when the circuit ends.【palwiki-precious-pelt†L1-L8】

solo.tactics: Queue sphere crafting before you depart so respawn timers are not wasted mid-loop.

steps.summary: Clear the Sealed Realm of the Pristine
steps.detail: Fast travel to the Sealed Realm of the Pristine (250,70), break Sibelyx’s shield with fire pals, and defeat or capture the alpha for a guaranteed 6–8 Precious Pelts plus cloth and ice organs before the one-hour respawn timer starts.【palwiki-sealed-realms†L44-L76】【palwiki-alpha-pals†L245-L307】【palwiki-sibelyx†L87-L106】【palworldwikigg-sibelyx†L1147-L1155】

role_splits.tasks: Keep Sibelyx staggered with fire or electric attacks
Capture or finish the alpha once its HP is low

hardcore.tactics: Rotate aggro with ranged pals and exit immediately after the kill so Hardcore deaths do not forfeit pelts.

steps.summary: Sweep No. 3 Sanctuary and overworld alphas
steps.detail: Fly to No. 3 Wildlife Sanctuary (669,640) for Blazamut and Shadowbeak patrols, then pivot south to Astegon (-615,-429) and west to Blazamut (-442,-561) before the in-game day rolls. Each alpha kill drops sale-only pelts alongside other legendary loot—sell between loops or stockpile for schematics.【palwiki-wildlife-sanctuary-3†L1-L25】【palwiki-alpha-pals†L295-L307】【palwiki-alpha-pals†L25-L27】【palwiki-precious-pelt†L1-L8】

role_splits.tasks: Hold the alpha while partners flank or capture
Loot and ferry pelts to storage before PIDF escalates

coop.loot_rules: Alternate who banks the Precious Pelts so everyone funds schematics evenly

hardcore.tactics: Stay mounted to dodge PIDF gunfire and bail out early if threat level spikes past one star.

next_routes.reason: Pal Metal smelting devours schematics and cash; pelt profits underwrite alloy expansion.
Carbon Fiber automation leans on expensive production lines funded by pelt sales.

guide_count.title: Precious Pelt Alpha Circuit
guide_count.trigger: Legendary crafting or gold income stalled because Precious Pelts and alpha drops are missing.

steps.instruction: Restock Mega or Hyper Spheres, cold meals, and merchant space so 500 Gold pelts can be sold immediately after the loop.
Clear the Sealed Realm of the Pristine (250,70) for Sibelyx—its alpha table guarantees 6–8 Precious Pelts every hour.
Rotate No. 3 Wildlife Sanctuary (669,640) plus Astegon (-615,-429) and Blazamut (-442,-561) overworld alphas to bank extra pelts between realm resets.

palworldwikigg-sibelyx.notes: Rendered wiki.gg infobox lists the alpha drop as 6–8 Precious Pelts at a 100% rate.【palworldwikigg-sibelyx†L1147-L1155】
